CustomField.formula:
CASE(RecordType.DeveloperName ,
"Donation",CASE( Type , "Recurrent Donation","S", "SMS Donor","N/A", "One off Donation","D", "SMS Operator","D", "Employee or client Donation","D", "Recovered Quota","D", "Solidarity initiative","D", "Solidarity Wedding","D", "Solidarity Gift","D", null),
"Grant",IF(ISPICKVAL(Type, "Grant"), "N/A", null),
"In_Kind_Gift",IF(ISPICKVAL(Type, "In-Kind Gift"), "D", null),
"Matching_Gift",IF(ISPICKVAL(Type, "Matching Gift"), "D", null),
"Membership",IF(ISPICKVAL(Type, "Membership"), "A", null),
"Legacy",CASE( Type , "Herencia","N/A", "Pago de Herencia","N/A", null),
null
)
CustomField.label: Tipo aportaci√≥n contable
